description: Main layout component and app entry point for a Remix-run based web application, including head links and basic HTML structure.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines link tags for external resources such as fonts and stylesheets, used by Remix for rendering in the head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: A React component that defines the HTML structure, including head metadata and body content, wrapping its children.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root React component rendering the current route outlet.
